metadata.title: CVE-2018-10254 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: Netwide Assembler (NASM) 2.13 has a stack-based buffer over-read in the disasm function of the disasm/disasm.c file. Remote attackers could leverage this vulnerability to cause a denial of service or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted ELF file.

criterions.comment: nasm package in hirsute is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2019-04-25').
